description: Adversaries may use 3rd-party closed sources or private datasets for finding Internet-facing AI systems, which would otherwise be hard to find. One example is backlinks, in which references or iFrames of AI systems are embedded in other web resources which are searchable by dedicated search engines.
name: Search Closed Sources

object_references.description: An adversary that identifies closed sources that include information about existing AI systems, could quickly discover targets without needing to actively scan them first.
